name: Pocket Pirates: Treasures of the Far Side
name_original: Pocket Pirates: Treasures of the Far Side
description:
This game is part of the 8th Roll and Write Contest on BGG. 

You are the captain of a pirate ship in the Caribbean sea. You must traverse through the islands of the Caribbean to uncover the hidden treasures. Mark your adventures on your map to forge tales of trials, monsters and fortunes and become the pirate of legends.

1 Player

10+ 

45 minutes

Mechanics:

Solo / Solitaire Game

Role Playing

Network and Route Building

Grid Movement

End Game Bonuses

Tutorial video:
